technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: WDC（水基钻屑） 用于替代天然粘土制备烧结砖。通过压滤机预处理，WDC 的含水量可从 80% 降至 20%，从而满足对外交付的循环利用要求。WDC 中剩余的水可直接用于制砖（240 毫米 × 115 毫米 × 53 毫米），以减少水资源的消耗。整个生产过程包括原料制备、混合、压制、干燥和烧结（温度为 800-1000 ℃；时间为 1-4 h）。

WDC（water-based drilling cuttings） were used as a replacement for natural clay to prepare sintered bricks. The water content of the WDC can be reduced from 80% to 20% through press filter pretreatment, which can meet the requirements of external delivery for recycling. The remaining water in the WDC can be used directly to make bricks (240 mm × 115 mm × 53 mm) to reduce the consumption of water resources. The entire production process includes raw material preparation, mixing, pressing, drying and sintering (temperature of 800–1000 °C; time for 1-4 h)

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The foreground data of raw materials, energy input, and exhaust emissions were obtained from a case study enterprise in Zigong (Sichuan, China), Chuangqi Environmental Protection Building Materials Co., Ltd., which has undertaken the utilization project of WDC used as a raw material for sintered bricks, with an annual output of 30 million bricks.

completeness.other: 采用了截断规则，这意味着在清单中可以忽略来自上游工序、重量不到最终产品 1%的低价值材料（Zhao 等人，2020 年），如粉煤灰。

The cut-off rule was adopted, meaning that low-value materials from upstream processes weighing less than 1% of the final product (Zhao et al., 2020), such as fly ash, could be ignored in the inventory.
